name: ESIR – WIN Fiskal (fiskalna kasa)
author: itcreator

sections.description:
IT Creator has created a plug-in that facilitates the process of issuing invoices. The software fiscal register (plugin) enables the automatic creation and fiscalization of accounts in the Tax Administration of the Republic of Serbia. ESIR WIN Fiskal works and has been tested with the WooCommerce plugin. Align business with legal regulations. Reliable business software for electronic fiscalization. Take advantage of the benefits offered by our software solution. IT Creator is your partner in the process of electronic fiscalization.
Electronic fiscalization brings a series of big changes for which we need to prepare in time. To our business users, we guarantee security and business continuity, professional support and a superior user experience.

Use of Third-Party Services

This plugin relies on a third-party service to function correctly. The service used is:

Service Name: Esir API
Service url: https://europe-central2-esir-44ade.cloudfunctions.net/v1/
Site url: https://elektronskafiskalizacija.rs
Privacy Policy: https://www.it-creator.rs/privacy-policy.html

When using this plugin, the following data is sent to the above service:
– API Key
– User Email
– User password
– User PAC
– Any other relevant data specific to the functionality

This data is necessary for the plugin to generate and validate fiscal receipts and other related operations.

Please review the service’s privacy policy and terms of use to understand how your data is managed.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

This plugin is easy to use. Just install it, set your WooCommerce plugin for
credit card or debit card payment then set the Esir API parameters on settings page of Esir – Win fiskal plugin then
set SMTP for your WordPress site to enable sending of emails and you are good to go. After every successful payment via card the fiscal bill will be sent to your customer`s email address.

How to uninstall the plugin?

Simply deactivate and delete the plugin.
